short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A great, easy and intuitive way to customize your new tab page with your own favorite sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A open source, great, easy and intuitive way to customize your new tab page with your own favorite sitesA great, easy and intuitive way to customize your new tab page with your own favorite sites.

Hisune Tab的纯云端版本，一个可以自动同步的chrome新标签页扩展，附带开发人员工具，支持暗黑模式

Github page: 
https://github.com/hisune/HitabCloud_Client
Home page:
https://hisune.com

#### features
1. new tab书签
2. 常用开发函数
3. JSON editor
4. curl客户端
5. 包括农历、节假日、todo的日历
6. markdown云笔记
